attributes.action: Participation Medals for All Team GB Olympians
attributes.additional_details:
I think that with all the money that it gives to good causes, the National Lottery should commision Participation Medals to be given to all the Team GB olympians.
They have all given so much to ensure that this is going to be one of the most memorable games in the history of the Olympics. They have all given everything and even shown that winning isn't everything and that taking part is the most truly important part!
Let's give them all, winners and losers, something to be proud of, and something to show their children and grandchildren in years to come, that they played their part in this truly historic event that has shown that Britain IS great!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games.
